data.title: Marie, Countess of Flanders with the infant Prince Albert of Belgium
data.meta_description: Photograph of Marie, Countess of Flanders (1845-1912) seated in a half length portrait, holding the infant Prince Albert (1875-1934), later Albert I King of the Belgians, who wears a white lace gown. Princess Marie of Hohenzollern-Sigmaringen was born on the 17th November 1845 to Karl Anton, Prince of Sigmaringen and Princess Josephine of Baden. She married Prince Philippe, Count of Flanders (1837-1905) in Berlin on the 25th April 1867 and together they had five children, including Prince Albert.
